attributes.action: Ban the idea of a 6pm curfew for men in the united kingdom
attributes.additional_details: I want the parliament to do this because it is not far on the men who have kids to look after and need to be out past 6pm especially if they work all day they need to go shopping after 6pm and for those men who have jobs such as police officers and doctors they are key jobs that need to be out past 6pm so there is no need to punish all men because some men have lives and they need to be out past that time
attributes.background: Ban the 6 pm curfew for men because there is no need to punish men who have done nothing wrong instead find a way to punish the ones who do wrong

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Government has not indicated that it is considering introducing a 6pm curfew for men. We're therefore not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.
